content.detailedDescription: I was south bound on hwy # 95,whereupon i oberved a large ball of light hovering above. upon aproaching the device i noted the object round in shape and haveing a semi-transluscent apearance. further investigation revealed that the above discribed object was proceeding north bound with no appearant sound and or engine to provide power. the ufo proceeded out of my view and was susequently observed south bound from my location.I subsequintly transmitted on my c.B. radio that i obseredd my first ufo!   at that time an unidentified male individuals voice came on chn 19 and stated ( o-what direction was it traveling?) i didnt responed. the object was apox.30ft. in diameter and had no appearant physical matter or substance to it over all structure!At the time of this incident i was south bound on hwy#95 in an 18 wheeler truck..Prior to truck driving i was in the u.S. army inwhich i was a c.I.D. agent. i subsequently spent another 15 yrs. in law enforcement i feel my prior backgound job duties my help substantiate the above given information on the ufo. incident?  furter investigation within the past few yrears on my part revealed that the said above discrbed my in fact be a device used by the u.S. in regard to anti-gravity travel???
content.summary: 500ft.Above roadway--bright light--- no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
We lived on the out skirts of las vegas out from under the glare of the lights, where you could see the night sky really well.
sometimes we would see air traffic for the airport or very rarely a police helicopter, now growing up around air force and other bases i know what lights on aircraft look like, close up or at a distance, we're in a 2 story house up stairs master room facing full south while watching t.V. on this night my wife & i were shocked when our entire room lit up as if someone had parked right outside our window with headlights and fog lights on high, i mean the room was straight lit up now we've caught the police chopper with it's light headed toward us but this wasn't the case on this night. once we realized it wasn't normal i had gotten up to try and get a photo turned my back for 1 second and it flickered off the same way if flickered on it might not have been a ufo but it wasn't normal at all.
content.summary: Very bright flash in night-sky

content.detailedDescription: I looked up in the sky south of my house in littleton, colorado and saw a very large odd shaped object low in the sky to the south west, moving slowly down or south, going slowly behind the house across the street. it could have been over lockheed martin space systems, but i couldn't judge the distance perfectly. i went in the house to get binoculars and it was gone. i got in my car and drove to a point a block away where i could see it again. i watched it through my binoculars for about 5 minutes or so. it changed shape the whole time i watched it, about a mile or so away (i guess)and forty feet long (i guess), but it was hard to tell if maybe it was farther and bigger. it wasn't closer i'm sure. i thought maybe it was a weird balloon or something twisting and rotating in the wind, but it wasn't anything like a hot air balloon or aircraft that i have ever seen, and didn't seem to be moving anymore. i drove to get a closer look and it was suddenly gone, so i doubt it was a balloon, because it had vanished while i was driving towards it. it was there one minute and gone the next. i didn't see it disappearing or moving away which i should have because i was keeping a close eye on it, because i was looking away periodically in order to drive.
content.summary: Sloowly moving very large object which either changed shape or spun and rolled

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with 2 of my close friends smoking a cigarette when i observed the orb above a building in the distance. we were on my college campus and when i first saw the light, i thought nothing of it. when i noticed it had dramatically changed position in the sky compared to the building and surrounding trees i pointed it out to my companions and they both saw it. we then observed the "orb" to move from right to left, down behind the building in the distance, rise back above the top of the building, then move even further to the right. at this point me and one of the two friends decided to travel across campus to the nearby field and observe the light without and buildings in the way. the campus rests on top of a rather large hill, so we were able to get a clear view of the object from where we ended up. from here we were able to see the object in a much clearer view. on that particular night, the stars were out in full view, and when comparing the object to the stars in the sky, we were able to conclude then that the object was far too low in the sky to be a star, too large and bright to be a star, and didnt appear to be millions of light years away, as it was only just above the horizon, which isnt ordinarily where stars are so clearly visible in the early evening sky. from here we continued to view the object for about 30 minutes before we were joined by another friend, who was unable to come up with any sort of rational explanation as to what the object could be. we continued to view the object until we thought that it must just be something natural, but when we started off to head back inside, i watched the object vanish from the skyline, as if someone had flipped a switch on the light to make it turn off. seeing how stars, planes, helicopters, and various other explanations could not account for a silent, slow moving, hovering bright orange orb in the early evening sky, i can account for nothing else other than some sort of object which i dont have any reasonable explanation for it, so i turn here. friends, what do you think?
content.summary: Bright orange silent slowly moving orb hovering moderately above treeline/ horizon.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving 3/4 miles north of the "old st. george's" bridge on rt. 13. i looked up and saw a cigar shaped object with 3 lights, as i got closer to the object, which was slowly moving southwest, i was able to make out windows in the object. there was no audible noise. my friend called my cell phone just as i saw the object, i told him what was going on and he told me to double back.  i did, the slow moving object was gone; however, i saw what appeared to be planes or helicopters now in the distance. i continued on my original course, and again the same/duplicate object appeared in the same fashion. this time i drove directly under it. no noise, moving at relativity low speed 50mph, approx. 200 - 500 feet in the air, approx 70 - 90 feet long. gray in color, cigar shaped. i'm not sure what i saw, my friend was on the phone the whole time, i don't have a camera so i couldn't capture it. dover afb is located roughly 30 miles south of my position. could these have been planes on a mission? i've never seen planes move so slowly, without noise. definitely freaked me out. i'm no saying it was alien, but it was an object i can't easily identify. hopefully someone can find out. this must have been seen by others, since rt 1 (a busy highway) runs directly parallel with my position.
content.summary: Several cigar shaped objects

content.detailedDescription:
Actually, this photo were taken by my phone, whitch it had its screen broken, so i was the only one who could opperate the cellfone. the interesting part of it is that i dont remember of takin thins picture... the objet its in the middle of a residential area of santiago de chile in front of my condo, i dont know if there is another report of this event. 
the date and the hour are not the right ones, because i notice this picture, when i was passing the photos, from my cellphone to my computer. so i was very amazed for what i found. i hope someone can help me to find out why i can not remember this objet whitch it appeared in front of my 19th flor condo, ir if somepne have had an experience similar to mine, thank you very much.
content.summary: An ufo that i dont remember...

content.detailedDescription: I was outside of my home smokeing a cigarette at 8:03 pm when i noticed a triangle shaped object flying from west to southwest at a high rate of speed with diffrent lights flashing and was sure it was not a airplane becouse of the way it was flying.I screamed for my girl friend to come outside and she saw the object dissapear.I then calle my friend don at 8:06pm becouse he was out on the ice fishing for smelt but he was inside of his shanty.I never have seen anything in the sky and i was a skeptic until that night.I didnt report the object but told several people about the object and thenon tue march 9th a half mile from where i live a family had seen the same object and reported it.That is why i am letting you know what they saw was real and i will confirm the sighting.That night it was so clear that the stars a very rarely that bright,one of those rare nights that you can see every star and i was only takeing in the beuty of the night not looking for a ufo.Manistee lakeshore resident
content.summary: Triangle diffrent lights eractic flying then dissapered

content.detailedDescription:
It was a clear night.  i was walking between house an shop admiring the stars on such a clear night when i noticed an unusually bright light south-south east of our house.  it is hard to estimate the distance, however i would estimate it was between 5 and 10 miles. the light was flashing in a seemingly random pattern. each color was turning on and off independent of the other.  the on time of each color seemed to be random also.  when a color turned on or off it was instantaneous, unlike a light bulb.  when i first saw these lights i watched for several minutes to see if it was moving.  it was not traversing in any direction.  my perspective was that the object was jerking around a central point possibly in a tight pattern.  the light was brilliant enough to cause it to appear like a point source light causing a dancing star like optical pattern. i observed the light also with binoculars exhibiting the same visual effects. i wanted confirmation as to what i was seeing, so i asked my wife to come out and look at the object.  she did observe the object for several minutes until she got cold and went indoors.  the only difference in her observation, was she did not think the object was moving at all.

since it was cold outside that night, we stopped observing while it was still present.  i checked the position of the common planets (online) and there were none in that part of the sky that night.  this light was magnitudes brighter than anything else visible in the sky that night.  i am a private pilot and can verify this definitely was not an aircraft.  we live under the seatac airspace and have aircraft transit this area often, so we are quite familiar with the appearance of aircraft.

i realize this may not be highly accurate, but i thought it may have some significance.
content.summary: Very bright red and white lights flashing in random time patterns remaining in same position.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a ufo last night and this guy on the internet said it was a stupid light and his site is [link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg].
it looked like a big triangle with lights on every corner and a red light in the middle. i am not lying and that site says that people who see a ufo are lying about it.
content.summary: No more stupid lights?

content.detailedDescription: I went outside of our home to call our oldest son home from a friend's house across the street.   from our driveway, i noticed my son, his friend and his friend's mom and dad looking at the sky pointing at something.  i looked up and saw a ball of light silently and smoothly cruising from the east in a straight line, then slowly started turning north until it finally disappeared. (at least about a minute long or more, and it disappeared from view behind trees but a long way off)   i thought at first maybe it was a really bright aircraft up pretty high, but quickly dismissed that idea... (living near hartsfield jackson int. airport, we're used to constant air traffic overhead our neighborhood, and i know what that looks like).
content.summary: Ball of light (white), bright from all angles, no blinking lights, silent

content.detailedDescription:
Black triangle ufo with 3 dimly lit lights, 1 in each corner, made no noise, flew over plant city fl. 
estimated distance from ground to air: 1,000 feet. 
flight direction: north by north west.
estimated speed: 120 mph.

  i went out in my back yard for a few moments tonight and by chance i looked up during that time to enjoy the clear sky's and bright star night when i noticed an object moving north by north west very fast. due to it's dark color blending in with the night sky backdrop, it took a moment to judge it's shape.  there was no noise at all and it had 3 dimly lit lights, 1 in each of it's 3 corners.  it was a large black triangle.  when a plane or helicopter fly's over our area at low or high altitude, within a few seconds or sooner you can here it's propeller or jet sound depending on how high it is.  this made no noise at all.  i observed it for about 30 seconds until it flew out of sight.  no other details.

 attached is almost an artist render of the object that flew over.
thank you.
content.summary: Black triangle ufo over plant city fl

content.detailedDescription: I saw a reddish/yellow light that wasn't moving, i thought it was maybe a satellite or a planet....Then when my back was turned to where i saw the light and outta the corner of my eye i saw a streak of light and looked back to where i originally saw the red/yellow light and it wasn't there any more
content.summary: Saw a light then a streak of light

content.detailedDescription: Thursday march 4th 2010 driving into the nc mountians on hwy 421 into boone. we saw this really cool cloud and pulled over to take some pics of it. we watch it for an hour as we were driving before the pics were made.
content.summary: My family and i were driving to boone in the mountians of nc on hwy 421,we watch this wonderful cloud and took several pics.

content.detailedDescription: I was a usaf special agent assigned to the afosi on eielson afb, ak.  we were running an investigation on the munitions site up the hill from the main base.  i had to go up the hill in the middle of night to change tape in the video recorder we had placed outside the site.  as i was locking up the box, i saw lights coming up the hill from the main base.  at first i thought it might be the security police coming up,but did not hear a vehicle.  i stood there in the trees watching as this bright light came over the top of the trees.  it did not make any noise at all and seemed to glide just over the tree tops as it continued over the crest of the hill to my right as i faced the munitions area. it appeared to be about 40+ feet across.  i thought for a second to pull my gun out and shoot at it, but didn't want to end up as dust where i stood if it was a ufo. after it passed, i ran to my truck and sped down the hill and and went to base ops and asked if there was anything flying at that time that showed up on radar.  i was told no and was asked why,but i did not say because of my position and was not sure as to what i saw.
content.summary: A bright yellowish white sphere about 40' across

content.detailedDescription: I first noticed very large long puffy 'chemical' exaust trails turning into puffy 'clouds' on 9-11-09, last year, the trails are very long, persistant, numerous and very suspicious, the trails on that day were created by 3 large white planes flying in a "v" formation over denver at 10am in the morning,ive been photographing them on occasion ever since. they seem to appear mostly on cloudless days,start in the morning and increase throughout the day, also seem to occur more on weekends then week days. i see them while going to work, riding my bike and at times photograph them from inside my car. sometimes they are so large and right above me that i can take a great photo, i dont beleive them to be standard jet trails or plane exhaust, i beleive they are the product of a "cloud cover" program involving global warming or perhaps a military program of somesort,i also see them in the backrounds of tv shows filmed recently, they are very obvious. my feelings about this situation is that someone is commiting a crime by doing this to our skies, it doesnt seem right and there will be negative consequences to this activity in the near future.
content.summary: Numerous persistant mysterious jet-chemical trails

content.detailedDescription: While visiting my son at f.E. warren air force base in cheyenne wyoming, we decided to see the thunderbirds show on july 29th. cheyenne celebrates the frontier days rodeo event every year and the air force thunderbirds are a big part of that celebration. i took a couple rolls of film that day while watching the thunderbirds perform their fly-bys and aerial stunts.  my camers was a minolta gsn slr 1.4 lens and i was using 200 speed film for the event. i did not see anything unusual in the sky at the time but i just recently noticed objects in the photos i took back in 2001.  i was in the air force for 12 years and i have been to many air shows over the years with my family. i am starting to review all of my aerial shots from past air shows. i have accumulated a few hundred. after extensive research into the subject it has occured to me that these objects are seen near air shows, fireworks displays, military bases, air ports and rocket launches.  f.E warren was home of the space command and my sons primary duties was to guard the silos in a three state area because he was attached to the security forces at warren afb. i hope these photos, i took that day, prove that there are some strange things going on in our airspace. i have always kept great care in my equipment so i know that the lens and inner reflective surfaces within the camera was clear and dust free. thanks
content.summary: I captured many ufo's while photographing the thunderbirds demonstration team in cheyenne.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw something on march 6. i was driving by lakeland florida airport. from a distance i thought it was just several planes flying in a close formation but that is explainable because they may have been landing. when i got closer i saw that there were seven small blue blinking lights like you would see on the bottom of airplanes. it was these flashing lights that lead me to believe they were planes at first. as i got even closer i saw that they were completely still. totally frozen. hovering motionless. it couldn't be planes. they can't hover.
the lights were pretty close together. they formed kind of a long triangle? not the usual triangle that people see. the people in my car said maybe they are. why would seven soundless helicopters sit there hovering in the dark without their search lights on? it didn't even move a little like balloons would. me and everybody in the car came to the conclusion that it was a ufo.
i don't know that it was aliens but it was weird. other cars on the highway were looking up at it too, so we weren't drunk or hallucinating. the lights weren't randomly scattered. they were in a geometric formation witch lead me to believe it was one craft. 
we were on the highway so we didn't stop but as we kept driving we saw two or three more of these lights higher up and not close to the craft. the were the same exact blue blinking lights that blinked on and off about once every second. i would have just thought they were stars if i hadn't just seen the same thing closer up in a formation.

also, in the past around a year ago i saw what looked like a rod. i was in miami and it was during the day. the rod was really far away and the way that the sun reflected on it made it not possible to be a cloud. as i kept looking at it i thought that it probably wasn't a plane cause it was going really slow but i wasn't sure because again it was far away. all of a sudden it shot off and disappeared.

one time i was in a car in orlando and i saw a white ball floating in the distance. but since the car was in motion the tree line got in front of it for about 6 second. when i could see the place it was again it was gone.


the last two sightings i didn't think much of but i thought i would let you know since i was making a report anyway. the first one though was really weird and i'm positive it was not explainable by known aircraft.




when i fill out the report i will be doing so for the lights at the airport. for the degrees of angles you should know that i drove up to and under it.
for the distance i don't have a good idea of how far up things are but it was close and it was lower than where clouds are.
content.summary: A triangle like object with flashing blue lights at airport.

content.detailedDescription: I first saw a very bright light (as bright as noon day sun), shortly after sundown - about 1850 hours, in the distance over the blue ridge west of staunton, va from my kitchen window.  i got my binoculars, 10 power, and went outside.  with the binoculars i saw four very bright lights close together moving slowly to the west. approximate distance 10 miles.  as i watched the four lights, three of them appeared to spread out like a fireworks multicolored starburst.  then, i noticed another object lower on the horizon a few miles to the north and further away doing the same thing.  these were not airplanes or helicopters, i have been around enough of both in the military to know the difference.  this happened on 3-8-2010. the object was moving slowly toward the west probably not more than 10 miles per hour.  altitude estimate about 2000 feet above the mountain tops for the first object, perhaps lower for the second object.  it was a very clear night with excellent visibility. i lost sight of the object as it moved slowly to the west over the horizon.
content.summary: Four very large, bright lights becoming starburst-like, multicolored.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in a friends backyard and he suddenly starts telling me that he had been mowing his lawn and just by happenstance caught something out the corner of his eye. he looked up to see what he immediately called a flying man. he looked at it for 4-5 secs and yelled out to his brother who was working with him to come quickly and see this thing. his brother ignored him. he ran over and dragged his brother to the spot. his brother could not see it and walked away. he watched for a few seconds and again went and dragged his brother to the spot at which time neither could see it. viewed from it's left side and below, it was a 7' tall man in a copper colored fitted shell that was metallic looking reflective material. it was 1.30 pm in the afternoon ,bright sunshine and mostly blue skies. the flyer was ascending at a 35 degree incline at walking speed. from its elevation he thought it might have left the ground 30 secs prior. he estimates it was eighty feet away at about 30' elevation ( right over a telephone poll he used for distance) and he had a clear unimpeded view. the flyer had a forward tilt, ski jumper attitude and was climbing slowly and silently.
the shape was immediately recognizable as a man wrapped in an aerodynamic shell. the hooded head and shoulders were smoothed together ,the chest was large 3' plus across. it tapered down to what was obviously feet pointing down.
he really wasn't thinking about it too deeply because it didn't make sense to him. he had never heard about the flying humanoids and was relieved to have me give some credence to his account. his brother was non responsive to the whole affair and only after i told them about this phenomenom did he think his brother might have actually seen something. which is strange because he was uncharacteristically being yelled at to come quickly. he said his brother was definitely worked up, instantly. we looked at a map and determined the starting point might well be a big church that takes up a large area.
he drew the flyer and captured its simplicity. the brothers are keeping their eyes to the sky.
content.summary: Flying humanoid

content.detailedDescription: We live on a hillside in goodlettsville,tn. we have a large picture window which looks out over all of goodlettsville. at approximately 6:50 i looked out the window as i was watching t.V. and saw four bright white lights in the northwest sky. the sky was clear and their was no moon. i saw four bright white lights just above the trees on a far hillside. the lights were bright white, then they changed to a bright red, then they changed back to a bright white. they all changed color at the same time. they were moving slowing as the colors changed back and forth from white to red. then they looked as if they were turning and they were gone. the longer i thought about what i had seen the more i realized something was not right about what i had just seen so i decided i needed to repost it.
content.summary: Four bright  white lights changing color to bright red and back to white then fading.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home and looking at the sunset when i first saw it. i am always looking at the stars. when i saw a bright object in the west at 45deg it was white then red.  my husband and daugher saw it. we are always looking at the stars and i don't think this was a star. i was looking at it with binoculars for 15 minutes and i don't know what it was.
content.summary: Bright light in sky

content.detailedDescription: I have easy access to my roof with a very good view of the sky.I often go up on my roof when they launch the space shuttle or launch rockets from cape canaveral.I have direct line of sight for the launches.I am about 68 miles north east of the cape.On the night of august 2nd 2008 at 10:15 p.M. i was on my roof top and saw two objects the size of satellites that you see traveling along the night sky.They where traveling at the same rate of speed and then one would lunge forward at an incredible rate of speed.Then as soon as the object did this maneuver the one that was left behind almost immediately was directly behind the one that zipped forward.The two objects did this for around two minutes and thirty seconds.Back and forth one would do the move and then the other would go first.I have never seen anything in my life as i saw that evening.I will never forget those moments in time.I watched them do this as they where headed directly north ward until they went out of sight.
content.summary: Two flying objects playing maneuver games

content.detailedDescription: Location- 39 miles east of indio cal. on interstate ( 10 )at chiriaco sumit.I observed three strob-lts. in the northern sky-aprx.3-miles away.Theobject made no sounds@moved slow,hereupon the object remained at said location about one hr. within that period of time i observed sm. red round red lts. proceedeing downward from the ufo. to the ground@going back to the ufo. two of the proceeded to the frt. of the craft @ subsiquintly left the area west bound (no sound) very high rate of speed. the red objects did not move about in the night sky like any air craft the u. s. has todate.
content.summary: Aprox. 1 mile  wide three larg e strob lts frt. of ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
It was 11 pm on thursday night, march 4, 2010.  i was alone in my hot tub taking a quick dip.  i don't drink.  my vision is good.  i had been to the eye doctor for an exam that same day.  i am 20/20 with glasses.

i was just looking at the sky and relaxing.  suddenly a brilliantly lit white ball just showed up in the sky.  i can't determine exactly how far away it was or how high it was in the sky.  i would estimate that it was between a half mile to a mile away and probably between 500 feet and one mile high.

i was startled to see it.  at first, i thought that it was a falling star.  it didn't move at first and was way too bright for a falling star.

it then moved from south to north in a very controlled manner.  there was no sound.  i have been around planes and other aircraft my entire life.  it was nothing like i had ever seen before.  it flew to the north at an incredible speed.  within approximately 7 seconds, it just disappeared.  

i would be surprized if others did not see it.  it flew right over i-40 at the western edge of albuquerque.  it was very, very bright.

there were no clouds that night.  there was no wind.  it was a clear, beautiful night.  

i am just curious to see if any others saw this.  

i am also curious to see if the object can be identified.

it has me very puzzled.
content.summary: A brillantly lit ball suddenly appeared in the sky.  no noise detected.  it flew from south to north and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Mr. javier reding a his family, go to take de annual hollidays in mar del plata, provincia de buenos aires, republica argentina.
he shot de digital camera, and when look the photo, he received a sorpraise.

dame detalles de tu c���mara. cantidad de megapixeles, foco, como trabaja, lo que puedas decirme.
dame fecha del avistaje o de cuando se saco la foto. s��� que seguro no lo viste y sali��� sin querer, es decir apareci��� ah��� nomas. es general eso.

4)	no es una piedra arrojada, ni ning���n otro objeto

6)	no se evidencia fuerza de translaci���n, puesto que no hay evidencia de movimiento en la imagen, por lo tanto el objeto est��� absolutamente est���tico. si fuera un globo , deber���a moverse por el impulso del viento, que sobre la costa la brisa marina toma mayor fuerza que mar y tierra adentro.

por ultimo para comprobar que el objeto esta ocupando un lugar en el espacio, un volumen presento el an���lisis realizado primero con un filtro de solarizado o inversi���n de color, lo cual demuestra la absoluta existencia del objeto, luego del embossado, el mismo evidencia relieve por lo tanto el objeto es absolutamente real.
content.summary: Brazil - hidden ufo

content.detailedDescription: Last night i noticed two ufo's off of route 27 in wiscassett maine in the south west direction they were both triangular with one light on each point of the triangle "3 lights total on each"  if you were on route 27 headed toward gardiner "town" and looking across toward the camp ground they were in the south west dierection as if  you were looking at the pool,  they were noticiable for about 1hr from about 10pm-11pm  this is the 2nd time i noticed them in this area the 1st time was about two months ago has anyone else noticed these events
content.summary: Last night i noticed two ufos off of route 27 in wiscassett, maine.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down california st in eureka california, towards the south. 9:00pm last night 3-6-10
i saw a very very bright light in the sky, dime size, it was to large to be a star, and much to close, the size of a dime in the sky...
all of a sudden 2 sets of lights came out of it traveling down and east. the bright object started dumping flaming objects like coals on a barbecue, they were falling to earth but would extinguish before impact. some were very large, fire also appeared to fall. when this fire stopped 2 more objects with lights came out again, this time flying upwards. the larger object emitted more flame and cinders, i thought something may have been wrong and it was possibly going to fall to earth, instead it flew straight up until it became very small and stopped. the fire stopped. it suspended itself at that elevation until the fog covered it and i could no longer see.
i know several others stopped their cars to watch as did i.
please respond if you saw this too...Pc_dynamics@yahoo.Com

i was in eureka california on california street heading south
i looked because it was a huge bright ball in the sky resembling a very large star but way to close to be a star
i thought it was a ufo as it could have been nothing else
its actions were as stated above,after being to close to be a star and after all the action this object flew straight up until it looked like a star off in the far distance and stayed there until i could no longer see it due to the fog.
i was frightened for the people who may have lived below the object and thought possibly they were in danger of it crashing down, i began to cry, to much fire and embers to have this ship in proper order
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large light emitting 2 crafts(flewse)fire fell from lite object the 2 more objects with lights flew out ne, more fire(hot coals) fell, it flew up and stopped

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to class at portland community college at 5:30 pm. i was heading up i5 going north toward portland and noticed a very strange cloud formation. from the looks of it, and the area, it appeared to clearly be an exhaust trail from a plain, but it does not look conventional. i had my girlfriend snap a few pictures while i was driving with the camera phone. you can sort of see them, but the pics need to be enhanced if anyone can do that for me that would be great! in one of the pics i drew an outline next to the exhaust trails of what we actually saw. some of the lines were to reference other exhaust trails that appeared to be flying along side of this craft that looked more normal. because of the very sharp turns and movement that had to be involved i do not believe this was something our government has, or would be flying in daylight over a big city.
content.summary: Strange cloud formation in portland skies - pics need enhanced

content.detailedDescription: This happened over 30 years ago but to this day i still can't get it out of my mind. i remember it was saturday on a spring day. the sky was vivid blue clear as a bell. my friend and i marcus were with our girl friends and decided to go to a place where many young people at the time went to make out. it was a wooded area about 2 miles out of town. when we arrived we got out of the car and were talking basically having a good time with the girls. i saw the object first coming just over the tops of the trees. the object was a red color with nothing metallic. the object seemed to have some kind of radiating back and forth through it. the object floated over the trees very slowly coming to a clearing then stopped all of a sudden. from the time a first saw it i could not take my eyes off of it. i felt like i were almost hypnotized and at the same time i felt we were being observed. my friend marcus was talking to me but still had not seen the object. marcus keeps calling my name but his voice sounded far away. and although i heard and could see marcus i couldn���t take my eyes off the object. then i saw marcus looking at me wondering what i was looking at in the sky. i saw him look around and i realized that he saw it too. his mouth fell open with amaze and seemed to be hypnotized himself. about that time the object went out into the sky at a speed i didn���t think was possible. i am sure faster than the speed of light. i looked at marcus and he at me. i ask him what he had seen and he answered me saying a ufo.
content.summary: When i saw the object i knew it was nothing from this world.

content.detailedDescription:
This is my second attempt to report this event. my first time was to a local ufo website but i never heard back from anyone. 
what i saw that morning has haunted and intrigued me everyday since. 
i was in my truck at the intersection of stassney lane and ih 35 east bound on stassney sitting at the stop light. it was rush hour and lots of other vehicles waiting as well. it was a cloudy morning with a ceiling of no more then 1500 ft i estimated afterwards. as i was waiting at the light
an object caught my eye just coming out of the clouds to my front and right. other people at the light saw it as well. the object a grayish metal color came partially out of the clouds. the portion of the object we all saw is best described as like the shape of a ram air parachute.
this part that was visible was very large and you could see squared sections around the edges and was definantly made of some type of medal. 
only a portion of the object came through the clouds and hovered and you could see the clouds moving past it. it was amazing. i looked at other drivers and we all missed a cycle of the stop light watching this thing. it made no noise. it stay there for about 30 to 45 seconds and backed into the clouds and it was gone. it did not go straight up but backwards just like where it came from when it appeared. 
i am a firefighter/emt and have extensive knowledge of aircraft and flight space around austin and this was not anything i have ever seen before or since. i tried looking up aircraft with similar shapes and size and found nothing.
i would be glad to make a drawing for you if needed. 
please help me try and figure out what i saw and help me put my mind to rest. 

thank you
john cole
content.summary: Large metallic object came the clouds partially then reversed back into clouds
